description:
In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggy`s pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat acharné : Zoro, le manieur de sabres VS Cabaji, l`acrobate
Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!
Souzetsu Kettou! Kengou Zoro VS Kyokugei no Cabaji!
Великий поединок! Фехтовальщик Зоро против акробата Кабадзи!
ศึกตัดสินชะตา! นักดาบโซโลปะทะนักกายกรรมคาบาจิ
壮烈决斗！剑豪索隆VS杂耍卡巴吉
壮絶決闘! 剣豪ゾロ VS 曲芸のカバジ!
